trends: There has been one other sighting in Whitehouse
There were no other sightings in Whitehouse on or around November 10th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from the grocery store with my son after 7:00. We had turned into our subdivision and topped a hill when I noticed a red stationary object in the sky. I thought it was a reflection on the windshield at first but then it blinked off. I pulled the car over and looked up and I saw it blink on again not far from where I had first seen it. It was stationary once again and lasted for about 30 seconds then blinked out. I rushed home, pulled into the driveway, jumped out of the car and waited for a few minutes and then I saw it again quite a bit farther. This was the last time I saw it blink on, hover and blink off and it was gone. It was very exciting for me and my son. So glad to see that I was not the only one in my area who saw it!!
